TEXT.TITLE: NATIONAIR SETS 299 DLR FLIGHT TO BRUSSELS
TEXT.BODY: (Nationair) said it plans to begin service between Montreal's Mirabel airport and Brussels three times a week for an unrestricted one-way fare of 299 Canadian dollars. The fare will rise to 379 dlrs in high season, beginning June to September, and compares with a regular unrestricted one-way economy fare of 944 dlrs on Canada's major airlines, Nationair said. The airlines said it sees the service as an option for business travellers. Reuter
